reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app collects various types of data, including personal information for providing services.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects unique device identifiers, precise geolocation information, motion coprocessor data, accelerometer data, gyroscope data, log-in credentials, IP addresses, hashed email addresses, and data across multiple browsers or devices.

content: Data across multiple browsers or devices

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions collecting various types of data such as unique device identifiers, geolocation information, and login credentials.
reply.reference: The app collects information specific to the use of mobile devices like unique device identifiers, with your consent, precise geolocation information, motion coprocessor data, accelerometer data, gyroscope data and log-in credentials. URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy
reply.data across multiple browsers: Sometimes, the app may use the information collected to locate or try to locate the same unique users across multiple browsers or devices to better tailor content and advertising. URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use by stating that the collected personal information is used to provide users with the services they have requested.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app uses personal information collected to provide users with the services requested, indicating a declaration of the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: CaringWire uses this Personal Information to provide you with the services you have requested from us and to provide. URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their data by contacting CaringWire directly.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to object to the collection and use of their information by CaringWire at any time. Users can request CaringWire to review, transmit, change, or delete their information by contacting the provided support address.
reply.reference: You have the right to submit a complaint or to object to the collection and use of your information by CaringWire at any time or to require CaringWire to review, transmit, change, or delete your information that we have collected and retained. CaringWire will fulfill your request to exercise any of these rights within 30 days of receiving a complete request... You can exercise these rights by contacting CaringWire at: Attn: CaringWire Support 8065 Crossgate Ct Dublin, OH 43017. URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may share or sell aggregated, anonymous information with advertisers, business partners, and other third parties. It also discloses that Personal Information may be shared with Participating Providers, other third party providers, affiliates, and for internal analyses and operations.
reply.reference: As Aggregated Information. CaringWire may share or sell aggregated, anonymous information to our advertisers, business partners, and other third parties...URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy. To Other Third Party Providers. CaringWire may disclose, sell or share Personal Information to one or more third parties with which we have contracted to provide services to CaringWire or to offer the services you have requested from CaringWire...URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy. To Affiliates. CaringWire may disclose some or all of your Personal Information to subsidiaries, joint ventures, or other companies under common control with us...URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy. For Our Internal Analyses and Operations. CaringWire may disclose Personal Information to third party vendors for our own internal statistical, design or operational purposes...URL: https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy.

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Participating Providers, third parties, and affiliates.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares data with participating providers, third parties, and affiliates, each having specific relationships and purposes.
reply.reference: To Participating Providers. CaringWire may disclose, sell, or share Personal Information to one or more Participating Providers in order to provide you with the services you’ve requested. The Participating Providers may contact you directly by email, telephone, regular mail, in-person visits, or other means. CaringWire does not control how these Participating Providers use or disclose your Personal Information. To Other Third Party Providers. CaringWire...with https://www.caringwire.com/privacy-policy
